column4: guys.. I want to have an IRC channel inside my office with certain channels as password protected... a channel for SVN commit logs, etc. - is there any IRC server that you guys recommend ?
practically every ircd supports using '/mode #channel +k password'
all right... I was looking at InspireIRCd cos it has integration with LDAP as well
I would also recommend using atheme as the services package in addition to an ircd like inspircd or ircu.  atheme has some ldap support in its development branch
you might need to run sudo apt-file update
oh.. is there any online place where I can search for mysql_config ?
there should be a package available for it
look at the blog post - 64 bit FF is crippled
I have had no issues with the PPA builds of it
neither do i , but apparently the javascript engine is going to be 32 bit only... that's the thing they dont tell u
I haven't heard anything about that from mozilla
and it would make no sense for thr javascript engine to work only on 32-bit when it can be compiled from source
